Title: Sharepoint WinRT Client
Description: A PoC to connect to SharePoint Online services, perform login and get info using REST services.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A PoC to connect to SharePoint Online services, perform login and get info using REST services.


Use this Project as a base one for creating a SharePoint Online WinRT application.
It currently provides standard Login and Query methods for SharePoint Online.

SSO is not yet implemented, waiting for a test scenario for implementing it.

Client authentication is done thanks to the useful information found at:
http://allthatjs.com/2012/03/28/remote-authentication-in-sharepoint-online/
and
http://www.wictorwilen.se/Post/How-to-do-active-authentication-to-Office-365-and-SharePoint-Online.aspx
